item.title: 特朗普誓言在加密货币上诉中援助被定罪的 "丝绸之路 "创始人
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）呼吁为 "丝绸之路"（Silk Road）网络市场的创始人罗斯-乌尔布里赫特（Ross Ulbricht）减刑，试图将自己定位为自由党选民心目中支持加密货币的候选人。【原文：Donald Trump called to commute the sentence of Ross Ulbricht, the founder of the Silk Road online marketplace, in an attempt to position himself as a pro-cryptocurrency candidate to Libertarian voters.】

item.title: 莫迪的民意调查目标成疑，印度市场准备迎接大跌
item.description: 如果印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的政党在民意调查中赢得较少的多数票，那么印度蓬勃发展的市场将面临下挫的风险，这将危及他更广泛的改革计划。【原文：India’s booming markets are at risk of a selloff should Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party win a slimmer majority in the polls, which would endanger his plans for more extensive reforms.】

item.title: 债务压力增大，法国将削减失业救济金
item.description: 法国总理加布里埃尔-阿塔尔（Gabriel Attal）公布了一项削减法国失业救济金的计划，以推进埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的经济改革。【原文：Prime Minister Gabriel Attal unveiled a plan to cut French unemployment benefits in a bid to advance President Emmanuel Macron’s economic reforms.】

item.title: 美联储最青睐的基本通胀指标被认为正在降温
item.description: 美联储的一线通胀指标即将显示，顽固的物价压力将略有缓解，这也印证了央行行长们对降息时机的审慎态度。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s first-line inflation gauge is about to show some modest relief from stubborn price pressures, corroborating central bankers’ prudence about the timing of interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: Glass Lewis 称，特斯拉股东应拒绝马斯克的薪酬
item.description: 一家大型代理咨询公司敦促特斯拉公司股东否决为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）提议的 560 亿美元薪酬方案，这对这家电动汽车制造商的董事会是一个打击。【原文：Tesla Inc. shareholders are being urged by a major proxy advisory firm to reject a proposed $56 billion pay package for Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk, in a blow to the electric-vehicle maker’s board.】

item.title: 对高风险 CLO 的押注正以 20% 的收益得到回报：信贷周刊
item.description: 随着贷款业绩的改善、债务利差的收窄和偿付能力的增长，抵押贷款债务中风险最高的部分的回报率也在飙升，大西洋两岸的年化回报率都达到了 20% 左右。【原文：Returns on the riskiest portion of collateralized loan obligations are booming, reaching about 20% annualized on both sides of the Atlantic as loan performance improves, debt spreads tighten and payouts grow.】

item.title: 英国石油公司南部非洲分公司和壳牌下游公司将出售炼油厂资产
item.description: 英国石油南非有限公司（BP Southern Africa (Pty) Ltd.）和壳牌南非下游有限公司（Shell Downstream South Africa (Pty) Ltd.）达成协议，将各自持有的南非最大炼油厂资产的 50%股份出售给国有的中央能源基金有限公司（Central Energy Fund SOC Ltd.）。【原文：BP Southern Africa (Pty) Ltd. and Shell Downstream South Africa (Pty) Ltd. have reached an agreement to sell their respective 50% stakes in assets held by the nation’s largest refinery to state-owned Central Energy Fund SOC Ltd.】

item.title: 上田暗示日本收益率创 12 年新高并非主要问题
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，他对长期债券收益率升至2012年以来的最高水平并无大碍，并称长期债券收益率应由市场引导。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda indicated that he has no major problem with long-term bond yields rising to the highest level since 2012, saying they should be guided by markets.】

item.title: 七国集团团结一致抨击中国 威胁贸易升级
item.description: 中国在全球商业体系中的参与受到了七国集团财政部长们的严厉批评，在显示团结的同时还威胁要进一步升级。【原文：China’s engagement in the global system of commerce was roundly criticized by Group of Seven finance chiefs in a show of unity accompanied by a threat of further escalation.】

item.title: 乌克兰财政部长对七国集团资产计划进展表示满意
item.description: 乌克兰财政部长谢尔盖-马尔琴科（Serhiy Marchenko）表示，他对七国集团就通过从俄罗斯资产中攫取利润为援助提供资金的谈判所取得的进展感到高兴。【原文：Ukrainian Finance Minister Serhiy Marchenko said he’s pleased with how Group of Seven talks have advanced on funding aid via profits gleaned from Russian assets.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉就巨额金属储藏与铝业公牛对峙
item.description: 铝市场陷入了一些最大的贸易商和银行之间的冲突，超过 10 亿美元的金属易手，而伦敦金属交易所的仓库却排起了长队。【原文：The aluminum market is caught in a clash between some of the biggest traders and banks, with more than $1 billion of metal changing hands while lengthy queues form at London Metal Exchange warehouses.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔认为 6 月降息条件成熟
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，下月降息的时机已经成熟。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said the time is right for an interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 耶伦称提高利率的路径需要增加收入
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，长期利率上升的前景使得控制美国的借贷需求变得更加困难，这也提高了在与共和党立法者的谈判中增加收入的重要性。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said the outlook for higher interest rates over the long haul makes it tougher to contain US borrowing needs, heightening the importance of boosting revenue in negotiations with Republican lawmakers.】

item.title: 阵亡将士纪念日航空旅行热潮凸显喷气燃料需求旺盛
item.description: 罗什尼-夏尔马（Roshni Sharma）是今年阵亡将士纪念日周末选择放弃传统公路旅行而改乘飞机的众多美国旅行者之一。【原文：Roshni Sharma is one of the many American travelers opting against the traditional road trip this Memorial Day weekend and choosing instead to fly.】

item.title: 财政部称赞比亚经济增长将于 2025 年反弹
item.description: 财政部长费利克斯-恩库卢库萨（Felix Nkulukusa）表示，赞比亚经济增长有望在明年从至少四十年来最严重干旱的影响中恢复过来。【原文：Zambian economic growth is expected to recover next year from the effects of the worst drought in at least four decades, Secretary to the Treasury Felix Nkulukusa said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行森特诺认为没有理由担心工资上涨
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺表示，欧元区年初工人工资增长加快，但这并不影响通胀。【原文：The early-year acceleration in workers’ pay in the euro zone is no cause for concern on inflation, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Mario Centeno.】

item.title: 中国反贪局调查国家烟草副局长
item.description: 中国称，国家烟草专卖局一名副局长因 "严重违法 "正接受反渎职机构的调查，这是最近一名因涉嫌不法行为而接受调查的高级政府官员。【原文：China said a deputy head of the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration is under investigation by the anti-graft agency for “serious violations” of the law, the latest senior government official to be probed for alleged wrongdoing.】

item.title: 越南中央银行重申出售美元计划以支持越南盾
item.description: 越南货币当局重申，计划继续向一些银行出售美元，以此干预外汇市场，支持已跌至历史最低点的本币。【原文：Vietnam’s monetary authority reiterated its plan to keep selling dollars to some banks as a way of intervening in the foreign exchange market to support the local currency, which has fallen to a record low.】

item.title: 马克龙访华考验法德关系：看点
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）将于周日前往德国进行为期三天的国事访问，这将是对欧盟核心国家制定欧盟议程能力的一次考验，而此时距离可能发生的激烈选举仅有两周时间。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron heads to Germany for a three-day state visit on Sunday that will test the ability of the European Union’s core couple to set the bloc’s agenda just two weeks before potentially bruising elections.】

item.title: 夏威夷电力公司就火灾责任向茂宜岛县发起罢工
item.description: 夏威夷电气工业公司（Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc.【原文：Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc. says it isn’t legally responsible for the devastating fire last year that razed the historic town of Lahaina — it was Maui County’s fault.】

item.title: 2024 年首场风暴来袭，菲律宾做好洪水准备
item.description: 菲律宾警告说，由于热带低气压 "阿洪 "周六登陆菲律宾群岛，并有可能在离开这个东南亚国家之前加强为台风，菲律宾将面临强降雨和强风的袭击。【原文：The Philippines has warned of heavy rainfall and strong winds hitting the archipelago as Tropical Depression Aghon made landfall on Saturday, and threatened to intensify into a typhoon before leaving the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 美国因担心禽流感限制进口部分澳大利亚家禽
item.description: 在发现禽流感疫情后，美国农业部已禁止从澳大利亚维多利亚州进口部分家禽产品。【原文：The US Department of Agriculture has banned imports of some poultry products from Australia’s Victoria state after the detection of an outbreak of avian flu.】

item.title: 台湾地位为何有可能引发中美冲突
item.description: 台湾富裕、民主，位于中国沿海的战略要地，长期以来一直是中美之间最不稳定的问题。双方都避免了严重的冲突，因为谁才是台湾岛的真正主人这个问题一直悬而未决。但随着中国军方在被习近平主席视为失地的台湾附近加紧演习，这个问题越来越难以避免。挡路的是美国太平洋舰队和台湾选民。【原文：Wealthy, democratic and strategically located off the Chinese coast, Taiwan has long been the most volatile issue between the US and China. Both sides have avoided serious conflict by leaving unsettled the question of who actually owns the island. But it’s becoming harder to avoid as China’s military ratchets up exercises near what President Xi Jinping views as his country’s lost territory. Standing in the way are the US Pacific Fleet and Taiwanese voters, who have emphatically rejected closer t】

item.title: 美国延长对芯片齿轮制造商应用材料公司的调查
item.description: 美国商务部正在继续调查应用材料公司（Applied Materials Inc.【原文：The US Department of Commerce is continuing an investigation into Applied Materials Inc.’s shipments to Chinese customers, part of a broader effort to ensure that increasingly strict trade restrictions against the Asian nation are effective.】

item.title: 千禧年要求魏斯在交易谈判中裁员并驱逐客户
item.description: 千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）要求韦斯多策略顾问公司（Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers）做出一系列重大改变，作为接管这家陷入困境的对冲基金的谈判失败的一部分，这些改变包括解雇除五名投资组合经理以外的所有投资组合经理、裁减公司的核心员工以及踢出客户现金。【原文：Millennium Management demanded a number of significant changes at Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers as part of failed talks to take over the troubled hedge fund, including firing all but five portfolio managers, winding down the firm’s core staff and kicking out client cash.】

item.title: 业主阿德勒与债券持有人达成债务重组协议
item.description: 德国房东阿德勒集团（Adler Group SA）已与大多数债券持有人达成协议，为陷入困境的公司进行债务再融资并注入更多流动资金，这将是该公司在过去两年中进行的第二次债务重组。【原文：German landlord Adler Group SA has struck a deal with a majority of bondholders to refinance debt and inject more liquidity to the embattled company in what would be its second debt overhaul in the past two years.】

item.title: 下一篇 英国政府面临 70 年来最严峻的财政挑战
item.description: 英国财政研究所（Institute for Fiscal Studies）智库表示，在即将到来的竞选活动中，英国各政党都需要坦诚面对下届政府所面临的痛苦的财政选择。【原文：All UK political parties need to be honest about the painful fiscal choices facing the next government during the coming election campaign, the Institute for Fiscal Studies think tank said.】

item.title: 奥特曼支持的 Oklo 公司认为数据中心将促进核能需求
item.description: 在宣布为一家数据中心提供核能的交易一天后，Oklo 公司表示，预计将与电力需求旺盛的行业签订更多合同。【原文：A day after announcing a deal to provide nuclear energy to a data center, Oklo Inc. says it expects to sign additional contracts from the power-hungry industry.】

item.title: 中国对外汇交易团伙的突袭表明加密货币禁令受到蔑视
item.description: 尽管中国政府禁止数字资产交易，但中国警方为阻止数十亿美元的非法外汇交易而采取的突袭行动凸显了加密货币在中国的持续使用。【原文：Police raids in China to stem billions of dollars in illicit foreign-exchange transactions have highlighted the continuing use of cryptocurrencies there despite Beijing’s prohibition of digital-asset trading.】
